name: Beyond The Abyss (Buschey)
description:
BEYOND THE ABYSS

In this short, retro-styled game, you play as a scientist trapped in a deep sea research station under lockdown. Uncover what really happened and figure out what to do, but beware. You are not alone down there.

The playtime is approximately 10 minutes. If you load into the game and don't see anything, go back to the menu once and press play again.

Feel free to leave comments and feedback, we would love you head your opinion on the game!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - move
  • F - use glowstick
  • E - pick up
  • tab - open inventory
  • backspace - back to menu

Have fun!
